quote: The problem happens when we have multiple desires. When we have fuzzy desires. When we want to do ten different things and we're not clear about which is the one we care about. – Naval Ravikant
fact: In every episode of “Seinfeld” there is a Superman picture or reference somewhere.
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke: I've been trying to come up with a dad joke about momentum . . . but I just can't seem to get it going.
